name: RobTheRobot
description:
Just a short game I made for the WOWIE Jam 4.0 where you have to help a pathfinding robot reach his goal. 

Tips: -Drop the box again, only then can the roboter detect it

            -Take the box with you to the next screen 

Uplaoding the game threw off the UI formatiting so you sadly can't read the "how to play" page. Basically, the robot finds the shortest way to his goal but he can't see wood + touching wood kills him. So you have to move metal boxes around so that his shortest path to the goal doesn't make him touch wood.
